document.full_text: in a relentless push against a talented counterpuncher, andy murray of britain defeated juan ignacio chela of argentina, 7-6, 7-5, 6-2, to reach the semifinals of the french open.
document.title: murray has little trouble against chela
lines_and_colors: in a relentless push against a talented counterpuncher, andy murray of britain defeated juan ignacio chela of argentina, 7-6, 7-5, 6-2, to reach the semifinals of the french open.
